title: Aural set, G major/simple error detection m 1

content.description: You will hear an excerpt that will be played four times. The score is printed correctly below, but in the version you will hear there are errors in either pitch or rhythm in several measures. Before listening to the music for the first time, please read the questions and look at the score.
content.question: Measure 1 contains an error or errors in

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
